column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////While our server was great and super sweet
column2: I find it completely inappropriate that the restaurant has a policy where they led us to a "clean table" with the previous table's credit card receipt on it. We told staff to take it
column3: and the hostess and busser both said "that's not for you. Leave it here for your server." We were able to see the customer's cc info on it. As a customer
column4: I feel completely unsafe with this policy and find it completely unprofessional. This review is purely on this poor policy.
